summary:
This mod will add a gladiatorial-esque light armor set which can be crafted under the iron tab.
Armor specs and crafting recipes are exactly the same as the vanilla iron armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add a gladiatorial-esque light armor set which can be crafted under the iron tab.
Armor specs and crafting recipes are exactly the same as the vanilla iron armor.

The whole purpose was to add a light armor counterpart to the vanilla iron armor.
This armor will be the first in a future series of similar mods.

Check the link out.. leave a comment... tell me what you'll like to see :)
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1323147-mega-armor-mash-up-collection/

NOTE: Female support is not available YET.. ETA = The end of the week

Credits:
CaBaL120 for being such a cool dude to allow to use his mind-blowing textures from his admidianborn series (Total EPIC-NESS!!).

To my laptop for not crashing anymore.
author: Bryanwee20
